fn.p: Edited by: Eugenio D. Hottz, Juiz de Fora Federal University, Brazil

Reviewed by: Rebecca Tweedell, St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, United States; Cristiana Couto Garcia, Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (Fiocruz), Brazil; Sharon De Toledo Martins, Instituto Carlos Chagas (ICC), Brazil
This article was submitted to Microbes and Innate Immunity, a section of the journal Frontiers in Cellular and Infection Microbiology
